ygData.subject: JewelCrafter's Jewellery and what they are worth.
ygData.msgSnippet: I really appreciate Wizard s attempt to show us what we will look like when we are 50. I think it is important to look at what jewelcrafters have to offer. (
ygData.messageBody:
I really appreciate "Wizard's" attempt to show us what we will look like
when we are 50.

I think it is important to look at what jewelcrafters have to offer.
( I am only including what is important to us Wizards)

(All of this is enchanted)

StarRoseQuartz (INT) - Silver = +2 Ring - Cost = 1p5g5s
Electrum = +2 Necklace - Cost = 3p7g5s
Gold = +4 Necklace - Cost = 12p5g5s
Platinum = +4 Ring - Cost = 111p5g5s
Jade (Mana/HP/AC) - Silver = +5/+5/+1 Ring - Cost = 4p1g8s
Electrum = +10/+10/+2 Bracelet - Cost = 6p3g8s
Gold = +15/+15/+3 Bracelet - Cost = 14p6g8s
Platinum = +20/+20/+4 Ring - Cost = 113p6g8s
Sapphire (STR/INT) - Silver = +4/+4 Necklace - Cost = 111p5g
Electrum = +4/+2 Earring - Cost = 113p7g
Gold = +2/+4 Earring - Cost = 122p
Platinum = +7/+7 Necklace - Cost 221p
( The cost for Sapphire is derived from the merchants' prices for the jewel.
Of course, it is far cheaper to find them.)

I just wanted to let everyone know what the wholesale cost of these articles
are.
